system.description: It removes all forms of masquerade or transformation from the target, and if they hide a particularly heavy sin, it shows its unmistakeable signs as well (e.g. a strangler would be seen with hands dripping blood, or a false witness with a lizard’s tongue). It lasts for a minute even with a successful save, but a failed check will make it last for a full day. The real question is whom to use it on, and when.
